results.title: Queen & Slim
results.creator_credit: Bron Studios, Makeready, Entertainment One and Creative Wealth Media Finance
results.brief_description: An exploration of America’s social and political climate through the lens of a genre-defying love story. The film centers on a black couple who go on a first date that goes awry after they’re pulled over by a police officer at a traffic stop.

constellations_other.name: Cleverman
constellations_other.description: Cleverman is dystopian sci-fi with a difference. With a predominantly Indigenous cast and senior crew, the series explores Aboriginal origin stories in a contemporary context, while examining themes of class, racism and power.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Bron Studios, Makeready, Entertainment One and Creative Wealth Media Finance
results.description: While on a forgettable first date together in Ohio, a black man and a black woman are pulled over for a minor traffic infraction. The situation escalates, with sudden and tragic results.
description_for_label: While on a forgettable first date together in Ohio, a black man and a black woman are pulled over for a minor traffic infraction. The situation escalates, with sudden and tragic results.

results.title: Punisher: War Zone
results.headline_credit: Canada, Germany and United States of America, 2008
results.brief_description: Waging his one-man war on the world of organized crime, ruthless vigilante-hero Frank Castle sets his sights on overeager mob boss Billy Russoti.

constellations_other.name: Powerful women in the frame and behind the scenes
constellations_other.description: Lady Sarah (Rachel Weisz) exudes power in The Favourite. These female filmmakers and actors do too.

results.headline_credit_for_label: Canada, Germany and United States of America, 2008
results.description: Waging his one-man war on the world of organized crime, ruthless vigilante-hero Frank Castle sets his sights on overeager mob boss Billy Russoti. After Russoti is left horribly disfigured by Castle, he sets out for vengeance under his new alias: Jigsaw. With the “Punisher Task Force” hot on his trail and the FBI unable to take Jigsaw in, Frank must stand up to the formidable army that Jigsaw has recruited before more of his evil deeds go unpunished.
description_for_label: Waging his one-man war on the world of organized crime, ruthless vigilante-hero Frank Castle sets his sights on overeager mob boss Billy Russoti. After Russoti is left horribly disfigured by Castle, he sets out for vengeance under his new alias: Jigsaw. With the “Punisher Task Force” hot on his trail and the FBI unable to take Jigsaw in, Frank must stand up to the formidable army that Jigsaw has recruited before more of his evil deeds go unpunished.

results.title: Pukar
results.creator_credit: Anjum Rajabali, Rajkumar Santoshi, Boney Kapoor, Surinder Kapoor, Bharat Shah and S K Film Enterprises
results.brief_description: Major Jaidev Rajvansh (Anil Kapoor) and his fellow officer Hussein (Om Puri) manage to rescue a leading politician as well as capture his kidnapper, Abhrush (Danny Denzongpa). The terrorist has been wanted for years and he is finally captured by the two officers. Jai returns to a joyous welcome, and is declared a national hero. He takes a break from the army and returns to his hometown. There he meets his childhood friend Anjali (Madhuri Dixit) who has always harboured love for Jai. Anjali is determined to make sure she and Jai stay together 24/7. At a party, he meets Miss India, Pooja Mallapa (Namrata Shirodkar). As they spend more time together, he begins to love her and she too begins to love him. In the mean time, Jai’s parents are arranging his marriage to Anjali but when they find out about Jai’s love for Pooja, they realise that they have to tell Anjali everything.

constellations_other.name: Dancing on a dream
constellations_other.description: Mechanical lantern slides called chromotropes created wondrously complex patterns of light through sliding glass panels and internal gears.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Anjum Rajabali, Rajkumar Santoshi, Boney Kapoor, Surinder Kapoor, Bharat Shah and S K Film Enterprises

results.title: Psycho
results.brief_description: When real estate clerk Marion Crane goes on the lam with a wad of cash, she ends up at the notorious Bates Motel, where manager Norman Bates cares for his housebound mother. All seems okay, until Marion decides to take a shower…

constellations_other.name: Good vibrations
constellations_other.description: Since its invention, the humble theremin has been used in a number of different ways to evoke all sorts of strange sounds and moods.

constellations_other.name: When music speaks
constellations_other.description: Some characters or moments are expressed more intensely through a musical motif than dialogue or action.

constellations_other.name: The drama and nuance of silhouette
constellations_other.description: Ali Gumillya Baker uses silhouette to evocative effect in her work reimagining the colonial gaze. The lighting technique has long been employed by filmmakers for its ability to dramatically convey a wide variety of emotions in everything from film noir to animation and whimsy.

constellations_other.name: Painting pictures
constellations_other.description: Painter and photographer Louis Le Prince was inspired to develop the technology to make animated pictures by the circular panoramic paintings of his friends. His films captured everyday life and alluded to his artistic vision for cinema.

results.description: When larcenous real estate clerk Marion Crane goes on the lam with a wad of cash and hopes of starting a new life, she ends up at the notorious Bates Motel, where manager Norman Bates cares for his housebound mother.
description_for_label: When larcenous real estate clerk Marion Crane goes on the lam with a wad of cash and hopes of starting a new life, she ends up at the notorious Bates Motel, where manager Norman Bates cares for his housebound mother.

results.title: Proof
results.brief_description: Martin, a young blind photographer, is divided between his friendship with restaurant worker Andy and the exclusive love that Celia—who is terribly jealous of this new friendship—has for him.
results.description: Martin, a young blind photographer, is divided between his friendship with restaurant worker Andy and the exclusive love that Celia—who is terribly jealous of this new friendship—has for him.
description_for_label: Martin, a young blind photographer, is divided between his friendship with restaurant worker Andy and the exclusive love that Celia—who is terribly jealous of this new friendship—has for him.

results.title: Promising Young Woman
results.creator_credit: Jeremy Cox, Emily Freund, Ashley Fox, Michael Perry, Josey McNamara, Ben Browning, Tom Ackerley, Margot Robbie, Emerald Fennell, Nancy Steiner, FilmNation Entertainment and LuckyChap Entertainment
results.brief_description: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.

constellations_other.name: Welcome to Chechnya: tales through time
constellations_other.description: Documentary Welcome to Chechnya used ground-breaking deep fake technology to hide the identities of LGBTQ+ people fleeing a government-orchestrated genocide in Chechnya.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeremy Cox, Emily Freund, Ashley Fox, Michael Perry, Josey McNamara, Ben Browning, Tom Ackerley, Margot Robbie, Emerald Fennell, Nancy Steiner, FilmNation Entertainment and LuckyChap Entertainment
results.description: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.
description_for_label: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.

results.title: Princess Mononoke
results.creator_credit: Neil Gaiman and Nippon Television Network Corporation
results.brief_description: Ashitaka, a prince of the disappearing Emishi people, is cursed by a demonized boar god and must journey to the west to find a cure. Along the way, he encounters San, a young human woman fighting to protect the forest, and Lady Eboshi, who is trying to destroy it. Ashitaka must find a way to bring balance to this conflict.

constellations_other.name: Drawing on influences
constellations_other.description: Waves of animators have been inspired by the style of previous animators to help tell their own stories.

constellations_other.name: Speculative futures, sci-fi worlds and environmental disaster
constellations_other.description: Deborah Kelly's The Gods of Tiny Things explores extinction and the climate crisis, the scars of colonialism, and the political shift to the right around the world through collage and imagined futures, much like these sci-fi, animated and computer-generated artworks.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Neil Gaiman and Nippon Television Network Corporation
results.description: Ashitaka, a prince of the disappearing Emishi people, is cursed by a demonized boar god and must journey to the west to find a cure. Along the way, he encounters San, a young human woman fighting to protect the forest, and Lady Eboshi, who is trying to destroy it. Ashitaka must find a way to bring balance to this conflict.
description_for_label: Ashitaka, a prince of the disappearing Emishi people, is cursed by a demonized boar god and must journey to the west to find a cure. Along the way, he encounters San, a young human woman fighting to protect the forest, and Lady Eboshi, who is trying to destroy it. Ashitaka must find a way to bring balance to this conflict.

results.title: Pretty Woman
results.creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners IV, Marilyn Vance, Arnon Milchan, Steven Reuther, Garry Marshall, J. F. Lawton and Albert Brenner
results.brief_description: When a millionaire wheeler-dealer enters a business contract with a Hollywood hooker Vivian Ward, he loses his heart in the bargain.

constellations_other.name: Princesses, rom-coms and sit-coms
constellations_other.description: Newsreel footage was captured on large, bulky 35mm cameras like the Mitchell Newsreel Camera by operators in the field, but they were also used by film production companies and on TV shows, with some of those involved going on to define different genres.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners IV, Marilyn Vance, Arnon Milchan, Steven Reuther, Garry Marshall, J. F. Lawton and Albert Brenner
results.description: When a millionaire wheeler-dealer enters a business contract with a Hollywood hooker Vivian Ward, he loses his heart in the bargain.
description_for_label: When a millionaire wheeler-dealer enters a business contract with a Hollywood hooker Vivian Ward, he loses his heart in the bargain.

results.title: Press Gang
results.creator_credit: Sandra C. Hastie, Steven Moffat, Martin Childs and Christopher Edwards
results.brief_description: Press Gang was a British children’s comedy-drama revolving around the staff at The Junior Gazette, a childrens weekly newspaper produced by a group of school pupils.

constellations_other.name: News on location
constellations_other.description: The Pye Orthicon is an example of the type of television cameras used from the 1950s in Australia for both studio and outside broadcast work. Such cameras did not have have the capacity to record while out on location and so outside crews would transmit vision and sound back to studios for recording or live broadcast.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Sandra C. Hastie, Steven Moffat, Martin Childs and Christopher Edwards
results.description: The activities of the staff at The Junior Gazette, a children’s weekly newspaper produced by a group of school pupils.
description_for_label: The activities of the staff at The Junior Gazette, a children’s weekly newspaper produced by a group of school pupils.

results.title: Powers of Ten
results.brief_description: The Eamses film shows a linear view of our universe – first from the human scale to the sea of galaxies, then directly down to the nucleus of a carbon atom. With images, narration and a distance register, it gives a clue to the relative size of things.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

results.description: A scientific film essay, narrated by Phil Morrison. A set of pictures of two picnickers in a park, with the area of each frame one-tenth the size of the one before. Starting from a view of the entire known universe, the camera gradually zooms in until we are viewing the subatomic particles on a man’s hand.
description_for_label: A scientific film essay, narrated by Phil Morrison. A set of pictures of two picnickers in a park, with the area of each frame one-tenth the size of the one before. Starting from a view of the entire known universe, the camera gradually zooms in until we are viewing the subatomic particles on a man’s hand.
